data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 10906, Version Hash: 3c144be67111a692bdc6f459ab98e235b53699b6
data.actual_result: The user list doesn't say you're playing anything. Clicking on your name will say you're playing a game though.
data.expected_result: The user list should say "Playing " followed by the blank (this is what shows up before you restart Discord)
data.short_description: Games may not show up after restarting Discord if the name of the game is blank
data.steps_to_repro: - Play a game or something. - Go to user settings and select games. - Make sure Discord detects the game you're playing. Delete whatever is in the box, then close the settings. - Quit Discord, then start it again.
